item.title: Server Freezes Every 5 minutes
item.dc:creator: @Epicskillz Epicskillz
item.description:
@Epicskillz wrote:

Ok, this is the third time ive posted this.
On 90% of servers i use, (all 317s) , the server freezes every 5 mins, actions are throttled, but everything moves in the background ( the character is just frozen ).
This is In my Server.java;

[code]public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println("");
banned.add(host);
delay = 2000;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 60000;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}[/code]

And i changed to;

[code]public void banHost(String host, int num) {
if (false) {
banned.add(host);
} else {
try {
misc.println("");
delay = 0;
delayUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis() + 0;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

}[/code]

I compiled but nothing changed, there are no other delayUpdates in the folder, any help? thanks

Add my msn : Connormarcus@hotmail.co.uk
I am using the OceanX Client (EvolutionX with a couple of bugs fixed) and it is not lag,as when my mates also go on the server, they freeze the same as i do.

Read full topic
